document_data.name: ''Jambiya''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Jambiyas''''' were sharply curved daggers common to [[Calimshan]] and [[Zakhara]].<ref name=RoF-p156/>
document_data.Etymology: The word for "dagger" in [[Alzhedo]] was ''jambiya'',<ref name=EotSS-pp172-173> yet when most people used the term "jambiya", they were referring specifically to the style of curved dagger<ref name=EotSS-p53/> found among [[Calishite]]s and [[Zakharan]]s.<ref name=RoF-p156/>
document_data.Description: A ''jambiya'' was a sharply curved dagger, almost like a hook. They tended to leave long, narrow wounds in an opponent.<ref name=RoF-p156/>
document_data.Popularity: Nearly every Calishite male bore a ''jambiya'' at his side.<ref name=RoF-p84>
